awd_titl_txt: Workshop for Integrated Symbolic-Number Computing;          University of California, Berkeley; July, 1992
awd_abstract_narration: This workshop is to be held in conjunction with the 1992                        International Symposium on Symbolic and Algebraic                               Computation in July of l992, at the University of                               California, Berkeley.  The area of integrated                                   symbolic-numeric computing is an emerging discipline                            which combines these methods for scientific and                                 engineering problem solving.  In addition, high                                 performance computing environments shall be considered.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division of Computing and Communication Foundations
